title: Lakeview 1-Bed with In-Unit MESSAGE FOR VIDEO
posting_body: This one bedroom, one bathroom apartment in Lakeview features an updated kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and microwave, hardwood flooring throughout, and in-unit laundry.
Call today to schedule a private tour!
This building is in an amazing location in the Lakeview neighborhood near some of the highlights of the neighborhood and the lake!
Just one block east are the many shops and restaurants of North Broadway.
Some of the great options in the area include CVS, Reckless Records, Marianos, Starbucks, Chipotle, and much more.
The well maintained Chicago Lakefront Trail is only a five minute walk from this building and offers over 17 miles of paved walking/running/biking path along beautiful Lake Michigan.
The Belmont Red/Brown/Purple CTA stop is within walking distance from this property and provides service to the Loop, Ravenswood, Lincoln Park, and Evanston.
What would you look for when searching for the perfect apartment?
Shopping centers less than a 5 minutes’ walking distance?
Easy accessibility to transportation terminals, also less than 5 minutes away?
Or, maybe, you love the outdoors and want to spend time in beautiful green spaces.
West Belmont in Lakeview has all that and more.
This newly-renovated apartment unit has a prime location close to Lincoln Park, Lincoln Park Zoo, Oz Park, and Wrightwood Park, where you can go for runs or take your pets for long walks.
Entertainment and nightlife venues are close by as are colleges including DePaul University, DeVry University-Illinois, and the University of Chicago.
